DOC.criteria: Has full legal capacity volunteer ; Has read sign information consent letter ; Is willing able follow instruction maintain appointment schedule ; Has ocular examination last two year ; Has clear cornea active ocular disease ; Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Has ocular disease ; Has systemic condition may affect study outcome variable ; Is use systemic topical medication may affect ocular health ; Has know sensitivity diagnostic pharmaceutical use study ; Has undergone corneal refractive surgery ; Currently wear contact lens extend wear basis ( overnight ) ; Has clinically significant lid conjunctival abnormality , neovascularization , corneal scar corneal opacity ; Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
